pages.text: $(#008cff)Aurorian Steel$() is a metal forged from all aspects of The Aurorian. These tools have the special ability to level up enchantments placed on them!

pages.name: Aurorian Steel
pages.text: They will choose the first enchantment they see, and if the enchantment has higher levels, it will upgrade it to the next level! Also cost of leveling up goes up each time.
